reference.notes:
Elements References -------- ---------- Li - Ne: P.C. Hariharan and J.A. Pople, Theoret. Chimica Acta 28, 213 (1973). Na - Ar: M.M. Francl, W.J. Petro, W.J. Hehre, J.S. Binkley, M.S. Gordon, D.J. DeFrees and J.A. Pople, J. Chem. Phys. 77, 3654 (1982). K - Zn: V. Rassolov, J.A. Pople, M. Ratner and T.L. Windus, J. Chem. Phys. 109, 1223 (1998)
Note: He and Ne are unpublished basis sets taken from Gaussian.
